Item returned
I loved the style of these pants and the fit. Unfortunately they are extremely see through and the fabric wrinkles so much after putting them on.
Great for travel. Non wrinkles,  Functional, Durable. Color is perfect
Bought the biggest size they had, fit like they were a size or two smaller especially after washing.

Great product I love these pants but they do shrink and I did size up! They are comfortable and flattering just be careful when washing/drying!!

I love them!!!very comfortable!!!

These are super comfy! I bought these to wear as a light airy pant for a cruise and they were perfect. I was a little worried at first packing them and having them get al wrinkled, but the wrinkles naturally relaxed out after about 15 min of wearing them! Definitely recommend! Super versatile and now one of my new fav pairs of pants!

These pants are so great! I ordered them last minute for a trip to France. They are so cute on, very comfortable and great for travel! Length was what I wanted. I ordered a small . Perfect for lots of weather, anytime except for very cold winter weather. I ended up wearing them much more than I thought on my trip. Have worn with tank tops and sweaters.
pants shrunk with first wash a dry

These pants are so cute and they are easily dressed up or down. Somethings to watch out for would be sizing, it definitely runs small, another thing to look out for is the length, I’m 5’5 and It goes up a little past my ankles. Overall super cute and definitely recommend!

评论概述: Great value for the price and GREAT for short people!
评论详情: Bought these for a trip to St. Kitts and am really impressed with them! It is a light linen blend so you can feel the synthetic fibers, but it's also $35 so I'll take it! They're very lightweight and comfortable, they're high-waisted and fit my long torso really nicely. They hit just around the ankle for me at 5'3". I almost never find pants that fit my odd proportions so well, so I'm really pleased with these!

After just barely 8 weeks (and maybe 10 wears total?), these pants have a hole in the outside seam of the leg. I love the pants themselves, but they did not stand the test of time and unfortunately were not worth the cost.
Love these pants
Love these pants. Very comfy and flattering along the waist. Not too see through. I ordered a Large and they fit perfectly.
Cute but leg too wide
Wore these all day on a winery tour and they were so comfy and breezy!
The fabric is very thin. Actually see thru. Comfy.

I love these pants. I have them in two colors. They are comfy and flattering. I wear them all summer long

Very tight in waist. Seems like a good material. I ordered a medium. I have no thighs, butt or hips. I have a little mom belly and I’m usually a medium in these types of pants. If I order a large I would look frumpy and swimming in the pants.

These are so cute and comfy! Great for when you need to look professional, but don't want to try😅
Beautiful pants unfortunately after wash I couldn’t Wear it because it shrink a lot.

I flipping LOVED these pants, until I washed them!  Washed on gentle cold water, low heat for 10 min to get most of water out. Lined dried the remained. They shrunk TWO INCHES in the length. I have a favorite pair of linen like pants from target that only come in seasonally. After a while the crotch/ inner thigh area got thinned out and some holes appeared from the rubbing. These have a nice texture fabric that looks like linen. I have yet to wash them so I am unsure how they will turn out. I love that they have pockets! My wife got these for a trip, they wear and wash well and are very comfortable. The color is good and is not see through.

I can’t wear in winter. Only with sandals in spring-fall.

I had bought the linen color of these pants and was very happy with them. I ordered 2 more colors and the items that came were about 2 feet shorter than the ones I ordered the first time. So frustrating!

Love these! I’m 5’1 and usually wear a small/2, after reading reviews I sized up to a medium and they are perfect! They hit at the ankle and are just so comfortable! Will be ordering more colors!

I wore these twice. Then hand washed in cold water and air dried. They shunk so much they can’t be worn anymore. Now my return window has closed and I’m stuck with pants that are too short.  I’m super unhappy and disappointed because I really did love these the two times I wore them.
Cute, comfortable, flattering and amazingly cool on hot days.

评论概述: So cute but shrank in wash
评论详情: These are adorable pants. I’m 5’4 and 130lbs. Typically I wear a US size 6. I ordered a small in the green and adored the look and fit. However, after following the washing instructions (cold general cycle and line dry) they shrank a good 6 inches in length. I’m so disappointed because they really are so cute.
They're cute and comfortable!

I will be honest that I was losing hope in clothes from Amazon. But there is an influencer that I follow on social that swore by these and she is curvier, so I decided to order these. Now, I want them in every color! They are confortable, breezy but not too thin, not see through! I will say, after reading the reviews I am glad I sized up. I’m normally a medium, but got the large. If you’re curvier in your hips or have a belly, I would say size up. These are definitely worth the purchase! And I’ll be buying many more!
The pants fit loosely but have a nice flow. Really like the material, cotton with a small amount of texture. Always get a compliment when I wear which is how you know you chose correctly!
These are great linen pants that are comfortable and stylish to wear. I purchased the beige color in a small and they are thick enough not to be see-through. It’s a great pant to wear for summer.

评论概述: Great for travel or regular wear
评论详情: Bought these for a trip and they were perfect for the plane and the milder climates. Washed a few times and have air dried as some reviews mentioned shrinking. I am 5’3” and they were still cropped enough. Very happy with this purchase!

Loved these when I first put them on, such a cute high waist, very flattering. I washed them in cold, air dry and they shrunk 4-5 inches in length. What were once pants, are now to my knees. So unhappy. I didn’t buy these to only be able to wear once. Do not recommend at all.

评论概述: Comfortable and matches so many things!
评论详情: I wear these to work all the time! They are both comfy and chic. The olive green matches so many colors too.
Really nice pants. Substantial fabric without being too thick. I wear a size 16 in most pants, 5’5” 190 lbs. I purchased a size XXL and they are perfect.

评论概述: THESE PANTS ARE 'DRY CLEAN ONLY' AND WILL SHRINK SUBSTANTIALLY IF WASHED!
评论详情: I wish I had read more reviews before purchasing and washing these pants!  I took the item description as fact and did not read the label on the pants themselves, which clearly state dry clean only even though the washing instructions on the item say machine washable.  I never would have bought them if it said dry clean only.  I did just now report this seller to Amazon for an inaccurate item description.  Well, the pants shrunk a good 3 inches or more in length!  And so, now they are well above my ankles!  The fabric content is 70% rayon and 30% linen, so you wouldn't think they would have shrunk that much, but they did.  Live and learn I guess.  Hopefully you can benefit from my mistake.
these were cute but I had to send them back because they were too small.  It took awhile to get the refund.

I bought a pair of these linen pants at the beginning of summer and loved them so much that I ended up buying another pair! These pants are both cute and incredibly comfortable. They’re perfect for those warm days when you want to look stylish without sacrificing comfort. I usually pair them with a tank top and sandals for a relaxed yet chic outfit, especially for dinner on an outdoor deck. If you’re looking for versatile and breezy summer pants, I highly recommend these!

They ended up ripping after only a couple weeks of wearing (maybe 4 times total) right in the center seem. They were loose enough that I didn't feel it was from personally pulling on the material. I loved them until this happened. I just went to return and missed my window by 3 day sadly. Shorter return window than most Amazon products.

评论概述: Material was a little too shear

Heavier than a linen pant, so they hang well. I'm 5'2" and they skim tops of my feet.
These are very wide legged and they are also Dry Clean Only!
Wore these to a baby shower and got a lot of compliments. Very summery and light, paired with a cream thin sweater tank and cream flats! Also wash well and true to size

评论概述: You get what you pay for …

Great linen look pants for summer. Very comfortable and they wash very well. The band detail at the waist is very flattering as well.
Love, love, love these linen pants.  I needed a pair of these beige colored pants.  They are roomy and comfortable.  Now I may order another color in these!
These look awesome on! I am 5'3 and they fit so well!! So classy looking and extremely comfortable. A must have

I washed this on cold gentle and it shrunk so much that I cannot even wear them. Unfortunately I will never wear them again

These are lovely, well-made pants BUT the inconsistency in sizing is infuriating!!  I purchased a white pair (which are lined, even though there is no mention of this anywhere in the advertisement).First time around I ordered a XL which were too big so I returned them for L. This pair fit perfect and I kept them; then I ordered a green pair  although I loved the way they fit I did not like the color so I returned them. Next, I bought a blue pair L and the waist was extremely tight and the hip area was a bit iffy, so I returned them for an XL. Although the waist fit better, the rest of the pants were too big, especially in the crotch area.  (The colored pants are Not lined). I purchased more pants of this brand in different styles and colors and ran into the same problem.  I think I am done trying!!
Bought a 3X and the pants fit my medium daughter.

I truly love these pants! This is my 3rd pair. They are so comfy and easy to put together for an outfit. The only thing I could say is that they need to be steamed or taken out of the dryer right away to avoid wrinkles. I went with my usual size and they fit perfect.
Returned. Very heavy fabric and pair of pants. Labeled as linen but these are not the line. I am use to seeing. Itchy too. And unflattering on my body type

I didn’t love the way these things fit. So I returned them.
These linen pants are true to size and very comfortable. They wash well and are stylish.

I like these pants. I had to order a size up due to the tight waist that is mentioned in several reviews. However, the description clearly says machine wash.  However the tag says dry clean only. I do not have time for that! I will be returning.

These pants are perfect. I got them in ivory and army green. They wash well and don’t shrink. I didn’t dry them. They are versatile and look great with a tank or dressed up with a blouse. They are roomy and flattering. I got a small. Could have sized up and been good with a baggier look. Get these pants. Lots of color choices. They do need to be steamed or ironed after washing.
Cute but they shrunk after the first wash. I would estimate that they shrunk 2-3 inches from the bottom. So I can no longer wear them.

Because I’m short, I bought these cropped linen pants. At 5’4” these hit right at my ankle.  These are versatile. Wear them as lounge pants or dress them up. I work from home and prefer wearing this to tight fitting yoga pants.  I bought both the brown and the dark khaki color and I love them both.  These sit comfortably on my high waist and I wear them with cute sleeveless crop tops and sandals.  I washed them once, on DELICATE, they held up well so far. Idk if it’s linen or a “linen like” material.  So far, I would buy these again, and would recommend you to buy these if you are looking for a baggy linen cropped pant.
Great for summer heat comfortable
Fits well. I'm 5'2 and they were the perfect length. Only complaint I have is that they're a warm gray...there's brown in them and I really needed more of a cool gray so returning.
